description: React functional component implementing a speech timer page with start, stop, and reset controls, displaying timer and speech details, with role-based control permissions.

methods.name: handleStart
methods.description: Starts the timer by setting running state to true.

methods.name: handleStop
methods.description: Stops the timer by setting running state to false.

methods.name: handleReset
methods.description: Resets the timer to zero and stops it.
